entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
